title: Drawing, "Drillground, inscribed Camp Winfield Scott", ca. 1862
medium:
Recto: Graphite on brown paper
Verso: Graphite, white chalk on brown paper, blackened for transfer
inscribed: Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at lower left: Camp Winfield Scott; and color notations at various locations.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto:  Two horizontal half-length sketches of a young girl in a riding habit [with indications of a side-saddle position].
Verso:  Horizontal view across a drill ground, with log house and tents in foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drillground, inscribed Camp Winfield Scott", ca. 1862.Recto: Graphite on brown paper
Verso: Graphite, white chalk on brown paper, blackened for transfer. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-131.
